STATUS.md.summary: v0.2.0 packaged. Build health verified. 72 tests. 9 gaps mapped to task IDs. 5 components assumed.

NEXT_ACTIONS.md.summary: 9 open tasks with full agent-ready descriptions. T-004 CHANGELOG (HIGH), T-005 aggregated view (HIGH), T-006-T-011 features/tests. 3 blocked.

LOG.md.summary: 3 sessions: task audit (2026-02-27), CI pipeline T-001 (2026-02-27), bootstrap (2026-02-27).

DASHBOARD.md.summary: 9 components with test counts. 72 tests across 5 suites. 9 open tasks (6 ready, 3 blocked). T-004 + T-005 are next.

TRUST.md.summary: 7 verified components (reader, spawner, monitor, statusbar, security, CI, .vsix). 5 assumed (chat, injector, commands, sidebar, lifecycle).

CONVENTIONS.md.summary: TypeScript strict, VS Code API rules, Three Laws, no em dashes, no direct main pushes.

WORKFLOW.md.summary: 5-phase AAHP pipeline. VS Code extension specific: webview CSP, try/catch, vsce package notes.

quick_context: aahp-orchestrator v0.2.0: VS Code extension that injects AAHP context into Copilot and Claude Code. Packaged as .vsix but not published. CI pipeline with 72 unit tests. 9 open tasks: CHANGELOG (T-004), aggregated task view (T-005), task creation (T-006), retry logic (T-007), release workflow (T-008), test coverage (T-009/T-010), filtering (T-011), marketplace (T-003 blocked).

T-003.title: Publish to VS Code Marketplace
T-003.notes: Needs VSCE_PAT GitHub Actions secret from project owner

T-004.title: Add CHANGELOG.md
T-004.notes: Required for VS Code Marketplace. Document v0.1.0 and v0.2.0 changes.

T-005.title: Aggregated all-repos open task view in sidebar
T-005.notes: Add a unified 'All Open Tasks' section to the sidebar dashboard that lists open/ready/in_progress tasks across all scanned repos, sorted by priority.

T-006.title: Add task creation from dashboard
T-006.notes: Currently can only change task status via dropdown. Add 'New Task' button/command that creates a task in MANIFEST.json with title, priority, and optional depends_on.

T-007.title: Agent retry on failure with backoff
T-007.notes: When an agent fails (status=failed), offer a retry button in the dashboard. Add configurable max retries (default 1) with exponential backoff.

T-008.title: GitHub release workflow (tag-triggered)
T-008.notes: Add .github/workflows/release.yml triggered on 'git tag v*'. Build .vsix, create GitHub release with asset, optionally publish to Marketplace.

T-009.title: Test chat-participant and context-injector
T-009.notes: chat-participant and context-injector are 'assumed' - no unit tests. Add tests for slash command handlers (help, status, tasks, next, done, phase) and context clipboard copy.

T-010.title: Integration tests with VS Code extension host
T-010.notes: Set up @vscode/test-electron for integration tests that run inside a real VS Code instance. Test activation, command registration, webview rendering.

T-011.title: Dashboard task filtering and sorting
T-011.notes: Add filter controls to the aggregated task view: filter by status (ready/blocked/done), by priority (high/medium/low), by repo. Sort by priority then age.
